subject: [EVP-ITC] Radio Shack Model 12-469: Used it for the first time today
author: Michael Edwards
full_text:
--0-742300976-1204814361=:17429
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

I used my 12-469 for the first time this morning, and ran a 4 minute tape session. One of the questions I asked was, "When a person dies, do they see a white light?"  After I asked this question the second time, I got a very distinct and crisp YES.  How can I save just that section of the file? Do I need to do that in the recorder, or can I do it in the .wave file I now have saved on my computer of the whole recording.
   
  Mike Edwards Cary, NC
